name: Bob's Quest For Revenge
description:
Help Bob get his revenge on his archenemy Evil Eye, who blow up his home planet. But the only way to get to him is through the portal and the portal needs six keys.The ones that hold the keys is Evil Eye's closest friends.Will Bob get his revenge? That's all up to you.

Bob's quest for revenge is a classical arcade style shooter with its own charm.There are two levels for every world and one end boss. You are free to choose from six worlds at any time in the game. You can play with a Xbox 360 controller or keyboard.

The graphics are mostly painted with pen and paper and scanned in For further processing. That process makes a unique sketched look to the graphic.

The music is exclusively made for the game.
One song for every world and shorter bits of music for different places in the game.
